content: Great game, retro mode is VERY authentic, however it's a little fast for me. I try to time my jumps but crash a lot of times.
Great graphics, everything looks same like the retro game, so many memories lol

The game looks and plays just like I remembered from 30 years ago. I was very excited! However, its absolutely impossible to play effectively since the direction arrows located at the left bottom of the screen as well as the jump botton the right side are so small and make it impossible to work with them. Timing your jumps and moves is completely impossible. They should really make them easier to use.
replyContent:
There are many on-screen choices to currently choose from. Use the "MENU" from in-game.

The GUI will be much improved in the next version.

content: Absolutely favorite game growing up!! So glad to have it. I thought it was unavailable for a time on the store. Glad its back!!! I would pay $10 for this if I had to.
I never really got to fully experience the game back in the day, on a system. Now I can have it right on my phone.
Excellent port of this classic game. Recommended for anyone who used to play it on the Atari and for anyone who wants to learn about one of the most memorable game from the mid 80s.

Montezuma's Revenge is one of the greatest video games of all time and now it's available for Android. The gameplay manages to be challenging without becoming frustrating so you won't be able to stop playing until you unlock the mysteries of the pyramid. Better yet, you can play with the look and feel of the original game or with new, enhanced graphics. Find out why this game has been revered for more than 35 years. Download and enjoy it today. 5/5 - An absolute gem!
